item.title: SnailCheck: Laziness from scratch in OCaml
item.description: Note: You do not need to be well versed in OCaml or property-based testing to understand this article. I believe the core idea should apply to any language with closures. I will be taking you through the design of an enumerative property-based testing (PBT) library, inspired by PearlCheckÂ 1 and LeanCheck. Like them, SnailCheck’s main focus is on being easy to understand. One reason I am doing this is to develop a deeper understanding of the details that PearlCheck (rightfully) skips.
